ygData.subject: Re: Rune comments & question
ygData.msgSnippet: Along with the Lexicon, the vendor Should also have your Wizards Cannon, Doctinre of Wizardry and Ispor s Enlightenment II and IV now learning the langue that
ygData.messageBody:
Along with the Lexicon, the vendor Should also have your Wizards Cannon,
Doctinre of Wizardry and Ispor's Enlightenment II and IV now learning the
langue that it is written in is another thing..heh

Auraelle Dracul
E'ci


----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Bratina <gbratina@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 6:52 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Rune comments & question


> From: "Tom Bratina" <gbratina@...>
>
> I got mine in the neriak wizards guild area (first door on the left
> downstairs). it is the red book.
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 12:47 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Rune comments & question
>
>
> >From: Cristie <cristie@...>
> >
> >
> > Wow what a long thread. I haven't found many runes either. I
> >found one WAY back at the beginning and hadn't a clue one what it was
> >for. Of course after I accidentally sold it in a pack to a vendor I
found
> >out ... oh well...it was one I wish I had now. Isn't that the way it
> >always runs?
> > What I do to acquire runes is this, when grouped with people
first
> >thing, I state I would appreciate if runes are found people let me have
the
> >opportunity to purchase them or they share and I will likewise share any
> >items I get for loot that they want. I can't use the big bronze swords
and
> >other warrior/larger class type items..so we do a straight across trade
or
> >I pay a plat or something for the rune, so they get something and feel
good
> >about it too. It is far less than I would pay at a vendor and its
> >generally more than they would get were they to sell to a vendor. It
works
> >out well...everyone ends up happy in the end, and most times we get good
> >exp too :)
> > I do have one question...this may seem obvious for some, but
where
> >do I find the tome to combine the spell components? I hail from Neriak
> >and I have probably just missed it. I would appreciate if anyone knows
> >where to find this item, please post for the dork here so I can start my
> >spell creation...hopefully...all the comments about the slow skill
raising
> >that goes on makes me leery but I have to try it anyway :)
> >
> >
> >At 10:09 AM 6/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
> >>From: "Jason Smith" <jj@...>
> >>
> >>I have only found about 2 runes, I am level 23... so you aren't
unlucky,
> >>just aren't many out there... I have also found a lot of pages and
words,
> >>20+...
> >> Zebbi D'Arcanus (E'Ci)
